hiveArticle.title: A walk beside the Lake
hiveArticle.body:
Wouldn't it be good to have a lot of Lakes in the city where you can enjoy your free time just by walking beside it. This is what I love about Bangalore, once called as a City of Many Lakes because of so many lakes around but reduced to very few lakes, nowadays. Though still there are fewer lakes its better than other cities of India. So since Monsoon has already started its good to walk or sit beside the lake to get the cool breeze and get the grasp of nature.

The images are clicked on my evening walk near the Nagawara Lake. Again the lake is well maintained and the whole family can visit and enjoy their time.
